meanings.definition: The process or art of making video recordings.
meanings.sent1: Videography involves capturing moving images on camera.
meanings.sent2: I hired a videography team to film my wedding.
meanings.sent3: The videography at the school play was so good, it made the actors look like movie stars.
meanings.sent4: Her videography of the sunset painted a beautiful picture in motion.
meanings.sent5: The videography of the concert made me feel like I was there in person.

meanings.definition: The practice or profession of making video recordings.
meanings.sent1: Professional videography requires skill and creativity.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in videography.
meanings.sent3: The videography business was booming after the rise of online content.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to videography was evident in every project he completed.
meanings.sent5: The art of videography is constantly evolving with new technology.

meanings.definition: The equipment used in making video recordings.
meanings.sent1: High-quality videography equipment is essential for clear footage.
meanings.sent2: The videography included cameras, tripods, and lighting.
meanings.sent3: The videography gear was so advanced, it felt like something out of a sci-fi movie.
meanings.sent4: His bag was filled with all the necessary videography tools for the shoot.
meanings.sent5: The videography setup was impressive, with multiple cameras capturing every angle.
